field.name: description
field.value:
The patch and demo project for a customized Form.EnumToPairs, as started here: http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-users/browse_frm/thread/7812ddafd76a5493
The Form.EnumToPairsWithExtension creates an array of Pair<int, string> same as the original EnumToPairs, but it can invoke a method (default is "Description") to create a localized text of the enum.

comment.author: bdaniel7
comment.text: EnumDescription-patch should be applied to trunk\Core\Castle.Core. EnumToPairsWithExtension-patch should be applied to trunk\MonoRail.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: * '''Type''' changed from ''Patch'' to ''New Feature''. * '''Version Affected''' set to ''Future''.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Won't Fix''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''2.0''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
